name: Ad Astra
overview: You are a star ranger deployed for long range reconnaissance mission in Rimward asteroid belt where Megacorp has eight Verge stations for asteroid mining. Suddenly your Long Range Quantum Communication link flashes and you receive new mission: STATUS REPORT ============= ROSCOS TERRORIST CELL HAS CAPTURED RESEARCH STATION TO HARNESS CORE DENSITY SINGULARITY AND ASSURE UNLIMITED ENERGY SOURCE AND WORLD DOMINATION + WARNING! ======== PROJECTIONS INDICATE POSSIBILITY OF RUNAWAY SINGULARITY RESULTING IN SUPERCLUSTER DESTRUCTION + MISSION ======= TO BUILD A SINGULARITY DIFFUSER YOU MUST ACQUIRE - NEUMAN BINDER - BABBAGE SIPHON - LAPLACE REACTOR - FERMI ENTANGLER + INTELLIGENCE REPORTS THAT LISTED COMPONENTS ARE AVAILABLE IN NEARBY VERGE STATIONS + NEGOTIATE WITH SPACE STATIONS AND GET THE PARTS BEFORE RUNAWAY SINGULARITY DESTROYS SPACETIME There are no other ships within jump distance to assist - you are on your own! When game stars, your ship is located in Verge Station 5 and you will get your mission briefing via long range quantum communication link.
